post.summary: Starts a session with an specific user.
post.description: Sends authorization data to log in an specific user.

parameters.name: authData
parameters.description: Authorization data to start the login process.

200.description: User info.

get.summary: Gets information about an specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to get.

200.description: User info.

put.summary: Updates information about an specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to update.

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: User data to update

200.description: Success confirmation.

put.summary: Links a new account with an specific user.
put.description: Updates authorization data to log in an specific user.

parameters.name: authData
parameters.description: Authorization data to start the login process.

200.description: Auth data.

post.description: Creates a new installation to be associated with an specific user ID.

parameters.name: installationData
parameters.description: Installation data to be added to the user.

200.description: Installation identifier if successful.

_id.description: Unique ID of the new installation.

userId.description: User ID of the owner of this installation.

deviceType.description: Device type of the installation. i.e. "ANDROID".

put.description: Updates an installation with the provided data.

parameters.name: installationData
parameters.description: Installation data to be added to the user.

parameters.name: installationId
parameters.description: Id of the installation to update.

200.description: Success confirmation.

get.summary: Fetches the configurations settings of the current user.
get.description: Fetches the configurations settings of the current user.

200.description: Configuration settings of the current user.

put.summary: Syncs a device with the configuration settings of the current user.
put.description: Syncs a device with the configuration settings of the current user.

parameters.name: deviceConfig
parameters.description: Information about the device to be synced.

200.description: Updated configuration settings of the current user.

put.summary: Updates the geolocation info of the configuration settings of the current user.
put.description: Updates the geolocation info of the configuration settings of the current user.

parameters.name: geoInfo
parameters.description: Geolocation information to update.

200.description: Updated configuration settings of the current user.

delete.summary: Unlinks a device from the settings of the current user.
delete.description: Unlinks a device from the settings of the current user.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Id of the device to delete.

200.description: Updated configuration settings of the current user.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Collection to share

200.description: Shared collection

get.summary: Fetch details of an specific shared collection by ID.
get.description: Fetch details of an specific shared collection by ID.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to get the details.

200.description: Details of the shared collection.

put.description: Subscribe to an specific shared collection.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to subscribe to.

200.description: Details of the shared collection.

delete.description: Unsubscribe from an specific shared collection.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to unsubscribe from.

200.description: Subscription cancellation confirmation.

get.summary: Performs a search among the shared collections.
get.description: Performs a search among the shared collections based on a keyword. It also allows paging based on an offset and limit.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Paging offset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

200.description: List of shared collections conforming to the search parameters.

post.summary: Adds a number of views to this shared collection and notify its suscribers.
post.description: Adds a number of views to this shared collection and notify its suscribers.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to notify.

parameters.name: views
parameters.description: Number of views to add to the shared collection.

200.description: Details of the updated shared collection.

post.summary: Adds a number of installs to this shared collection and notify its suscribers.
post.description: Adds a number of installs to this shared collection and notify its suscribers.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to notify.

parameters.name: installs
parameters.description: Number of installs to add to the shared collection.

200.description: Details of the updated shared collection.

post.summary: Notify to this shared collection's suscribers.
post.description: Notify to this shared collection's suscribers.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to notify.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: (this should be changed in v2, currently the request needs a JSON object inside the body, but doesn't do anything with it, at least it seems like it)

200.description: Details of the updated shared collection.

post.summary: Rate this collection with an specific number of stars (1-5).
post.description: Rate this collection with an specific number of stars (1-5).

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: ID of the shared collection to rate.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Rating value (1-5)

200.description: Details of the rated shared collection.

post.summary: Returns a list of collections that match the provided filters/categories.
post.description: Returns a list of collections that match the provided filters/categories.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: One filter [top | latest], to get the top ranked collections or the latest ones.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: An app category between the following - ALL_APPS, ALL_CATEGORIES, CUSTOM, MISC, GAME, BOOKS_AND_REFERENCE, BUSINESS, COMICS, COMMUNICATION, EDUCATION, ENTERTAINMENT, FINANCE, HEALTH_AND_FITNESS, LIBRARIES_AND_DEMO, LIFESTYLE, APP_WALLPAPER, MEDIA_AND_VIDEO, MEDICAL, MUSIC_AND_AUDIO, NEWS_AND_MAGAZINES, PERSONALIZATION, PHOTOGRAPHY, PRODUCTIVITY, SHOPPING, SOCIAL, SPORTS, TOOLS, TRANSPORTATION, TRAVEL_AND_LOCAL, WEATHER, APP_WIDGETS, GAME_ACTION, GAME_ADVENTURE, GAME_RACING, GAME_CARD, GAME_CASINO, GAME_CASUAL, GAME_FAMILY, GAME_SPORTS, GAME_EDUCATIONAL, GAME_STRATEGY, GAME_WALLPAPER, GAME_TRIVIA, GAME_BOARD, GAME_ROLE_PLAYING, GAME_MUSIC, GAME_WORD, GAME_PUZZLE, GAME_ARCADE, GAME_SIMULATION, GAME_WIDGETS.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Paging offset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

200.description: List of shared collections conforming to the search parameters.

post.summary: Returns a list of collections that match the provided filter.
post.description: Returns a list of collections that match the provided filter.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: One filter [top | latest], to get the top ranked collections or the latest ones.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Paging offset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

200.description: List of shared collections conforming to the search parameters.

get.summary: Fetch a list of recommended apps.
get.description: Fetch a list of recommended apps.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Info to help the backend to choose recommendations for the user.

200.description: An array of collections

packages.description: Array containing Google Play packages corresponding to this collection.

wifi.description: SSID of WiFi networks associated with the collection.

radius.description: Geolocation radius associated with the collection. (nullable).

lat.description: Geolocation latitude associated with the collection. (nullable).

lng.description: Geolocation longitude associated with the collection. (nullable).

alt.description: Geolocation altitude associated with the collection. (nullable).

action.description: Identifier of the action to perform.

publishedOn.description: Publish date of this shared collection in UNIX format. (nullable).

userConfigId.description: Unique identifier for the user config associated with this shared collection.

screenshots.description: List of screenshots of the apps included in this collection. (nullable).

tags.description: List of tags associated with this collection.

packages.description: List of packages included in this collection.

resolvedPackages.description: List of detailed info about the packages included in this collection. (nullable).

lat.description: Latitude coordinate associated with this collection. (nullable).

lng.description: Longitude coordinate associated with this collection. (nullable).

alt.description: Altitude coordinate associated with this collection. (nullable).

views.description: Number of views of this collection. (nullable).

installs.description: Number of installs of this collection. (nullable).

icon.description: Predefined icon identifier associated with this collection. (nullable).

community.description: true if this is a community collection. (nullable).

SharedCollectionSubscription.description: Information describing a subscription to a shared collection.

sharedCollectionId.description: Unique ID of the collection the user has just subscribed to.

secretToken.description: Secret token that identifies this account.

permissions.description: List of permissions to ask to Google when identifying this user.

userId.description: User ID of the owner of this installation. (nullable).

deviceType.description: Device type of the installation. i.e. "ANDROID". (nullable).

email.description: User email for this Google account.

devices.description: List of logged in devices for this account.

categories.description: Google Play categories of the app recommendations we're requesting.

likePackages.description: Packages of apps similar to the recommendations we're requesting.

excludePackages.description: Packages of apps that shouldn't be included in the recommendations we're requesting.

packageName.description: Google Play name of this package.

title.description: Title of the app included in this package.

description.description: Description of the app included in this package.

free.description: true if the app in this package is free.

icon.description: Image URL of the icon of this package.

stars.description: Float representation of the ratings based in stars (1-5).

downloads.description: Formatted figure for the number of downloads of the app included in this package.

AppInformation.description: Information describing an app in Google Play.

backendDocid.description: Unique backend ID of this app.

descriptionHtml.description: HTML string containing the description of this app.

offer.description: List of app purchases available in this app.

image.description: List of images associated with this app.

tvShowDetails.description: Details for this TV Show content. (nullable)

tvSeasonDetails.description: Details for this TV Season content. (nullable)

tvEpisodeDetails.description: Details for this TV Episode content. (nullable)

detailsUrl.description: URL to get the details of this app.

shareUrl.description: Shareable URL to access the app in Google Play.

reviewsUrl.description: URL to get the reviews and ratings of this app.

backendUrl.description: URL to access the backend of this app. (???) (nullable)

purchaseDetailsUrl.description: Url to access the details of the purchase of this app.

detailsReusable.description: true if the details are reusable.

AppOfferInfo.description: Information describing an specific purchase/subscription inside an app of Google Play.

micros.description: Price expressed in millionth of the base currency.

currencyCode.description: Base currency expressed in 3 letter currency code (ISO 4217)

fullPriceMicros.description: Full price of purchase expressed in millionth of the base currency. (nullable)

formattedFullAmount.description: Formatted representation of the full price. (nullable)

rentalTerms.description: Terms for the rental if available. (nullable)

subscriptionTerms.description: Terms for the subscription if available. (nullable)

AppAvailabilityInfo.description: Information describing the availability of an app/content in Google Play.

availableIfOwned.description: true if this content is available if purchased.

AppImageInfo.description: Information describing an image associated with an app/content in Google Play.

imageType.description: Identifier for the type of this image.

altTextLocalized.description: Localized alternative text of this image. (nullable)

positionInSequence.description: If the image is part of a sequence, the index representing its position. (nullable)

AppDetail.description: Detailed info about an app/content in Google Play.

developerName.description: Name of the developer person/company of the app.

appCategory.description: List of Google Play categories associated with this app.

contentRating.description: Rating for the content of this app.

installationSize.description: Size of the installed app in bytes.

permission.description: List of permissions needed to run this app.

developerEmail.description: Email address of the developer of this app.

numDownloads.description: Formatted figure for downloads of this app.

recentChangesHtml.description: Html string describing the changes in the latest version of this app.

uploadDate.description: Formatted upload date of the latest version of this app.

appType.description: String describing the type of this app.

fileType.description: Code describing the type of this file (???).

versionCode.description: Code describing the version of this file.

starRating.description: Float representation of the ratings based in stars (1-5)

ratingsCount.description: Total number of ratings of this app.

oneStarRatings.description: Total number of 1-star ratings of this app.

twoStarRatings.description: Total number of 2-star ratings of this app.

threeStarRatings.description: Total number of 3-star ratings of this app.

fourStarRatings.description: Total number of 4-star ratings of this app.

fiveStarRatings.description: Total number of 5-star ratings of this app.

thumbsUpCount.description: Total number of thumbs up ratings. (nullable)

thumbsDownCount.description: Total number of thumbs down of this app. (nullable)

commentCount.description: Total number of comments of this app.

bayesianMeanRating.description: Rating of this app expressed as the Bayesian mean of its ratings. (nullable)

PlusProfileImage.description: Description of an user's image in Google Plus.

imageType.description: Identifier for the type of this image

PlusData.description: Information about an user's Google Plus account.

displayName.description: Display name of the user in Google Plus.

DeviceConfig.description: Information describing an user's device configuration settings.

collections.description: Collections contained in the current configuration settings.

lastSynced.description: Date of the last syncronization with the device. (nullable)

UserStatusInfo.description: Information about the current status of an user.

products.description: List containing the unique codes of the user's purchased products (i.e. "pro.upgrade").

items.description: Unique code of a purchasable product (i.e. "pro.upgrade").

earlyAdopter.description: true if user is an early adopter.

communityMember.description: true if user is a community member.

tester.description: true if user is a tester.

homeMorning.description: Geolocation associated with moments at home in the morning.

homeNight.description: Geolocation associated with moments at home at night.

work.description: Geolocation associated with moments at work.

current.description: Geolocation associated with the current moment.

occurrence.description: List of moments in time associated with this geolocation.

TimeSlot.description: Information about the times associated with the collection.

days.description: List of days of the week associated with the collection. i.e. (0-6).

UserConfig.description: Information describing an user's configuration settings.

geoInfo.description: Information about geolocation associated with the user.

emailCampaigns.description: true if subscribed to email campaigns. (nullable).

OnePlusRequest.description: Data needed for notifyPlusOne to work

Installs.description: Number of installs to notify a shared collection.

Views.description: Number of views to notify a shared collection.

sessionToken.name: X-Session-Token
sessionToken.description: Appsly session token obtained from a valid login request.
